--- DateTime: 2021/12/24 10:52
--- 判断是不是被控制 
---@class bt_con_baseControlled:ICondition
local bt_con_baseControlled = SimpleClassUtil:class(ICondition)

function bt_con_baseControlled:initData()

end
---@param blackBoard BlackBoard_BattleBase
---@param battleManager PVE_Config_Battle_Manager
function bt_con_baseControlled:doCondition(blackBoard,battleManager)
    local result = Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
    local _isUnPutSkill =  blackBoard._isSwimmy
            or blackBoard._isExiled
            or blackBoard._isBeatBack
    if not _isUnPutSkill then
        result = Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success
    else
        result = Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
    end
    self:log("bt_con_baseControlled ** ",result)
    return result
end


return bt_con_baseControlled
